item.description:
Hi all,

There seemed to be quite a bit of interest in watching the Eurocup final this Sunday and Markus generously offered his home as the venue - thanks Markus!

Maybe everyone can bring a few snacks, beer, soda, bloody mary mix was also mentioned?? Whatever floats your boat!

The game actually starts at 2:45 and I have included Markus's phone number as there was no apartment number in his address. Just thought I would be safe - we don't want Ebru driving around the neighborhood looking for the apartment again, jot that number down Ebru!

Nele and I will be there supporting Deutschland, hope you can all join.

Best,
Brad
item.name: Eurocup Final Game - Germany vs.
